template: return sign * __ if INT_MIN <= sign * __ <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
template_origin: return sign * tot if INT_MIN <= sign * tot <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX

translation_pairs.source: return sign * x if INT_MIN <= sign * x <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
return sign * z if INT_MIN <= sign * z <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
return sign * x if INT_MIN <= sign * x <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
return sign * b if INT_MIN <= sign * b <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
return sign * y if INT_MIN <= sign * y <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
translation_pairs.target: return (sign * y >= INT_MIN && sign * y <= INT_MAX) ? sign * y : INT_MAX;

translation_pairs.source: return sign * a if INT_MIN <= sign * a <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
translation_pairs.target: return (sign * a >= INT_MIN && sign * a <= INT_MAX) ? sign * a : INT_MAX;

translation_pairs.source: return sign * z if INT_MIN <= sign * z <= INT_MAX else INT_MAX
